name: Beasts Shall Rise
detailed_description:
About the game
Fight your way through swarms of undead zombies, vampires and werewolves in this action packed VR game. Set in the 1980's Beasts Shall Rise is a love letter to the classics - Doom, Castlevania, Ghosts n Goblins, Gauntlet, Sabre Wulf, Knight Lore, Underwurlde, Atic Atac etc

Key Features

  • Heavy metal synthwave gorefest
  • Hyper realistic VR environment
  • Creepy as hell itself
  • Vast array of brutal weaponry
  • Limb dismemberment and decapitation
  • Full freedom of movement
  • Fast paced intense action
  • Jesus radar

Weapons
While you start off the game with only your trusty revolver, you will soon discover new weapons along the way that can be collected and added to your arsenal. Including chainsaws, grenades, machineguns etc. The weapons you can collect will depend on the route you choose to take to the final battle. Either way, time is not on your side.

Control Scheme
Promising full freedom of movement (no teleporting!) Beasts Shall Rise® is a single-player first-person VR shooter which allows the player to explore the environment however they choose. The game is playable either seated or standing using motion controllers and requires only a small room area.

Replayability
The game is designed to offer an arcade style experience with a high level of replayability. Spawn points and pathways will change on each play meaning no two games will be identical. The game also contains many seasonal hidden Easter eggs which are triggered to only appear on certain days of the year. Don't play late at night though....or risk finding yourself in Midnight Madness Mode!

Hardware Requirements
The game is designed for Oculus Rift and HTC Vive VR headsets. Touch controllers or Vive controllers needed. Minimum spec graphics card is Nvidia GeForce GTX980. Please ensure you meet the necessary hardware specs before purchase.

Health Warning
Please DO NOT play Beasts Shall Rise if you suffer from any health issues or are pregnant. This is a very scary and intense game. Not for the faint hearted!

  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: any
  • Additional Notes: Xbox type gamepad required
